original:
Adds MMA martial arts support for weapons from various mods <color_light_red>NOTE, you MUST have the mods below enabled, otherwise it will throw a NEGLIGIBLE (ignorable) error</color>

<color_light_green>Currently supported mods: Magiclysm, BL9, Cata++, Aftershock, Battle Maid, CBM Equipment, Real Dark Skies, Ninja_Mod, Project Kawaii, Nechronica Redux, vorpal weapons, The Vermilion Mod</color>
translation:
（建议将此mod放在“模组载入顺序”列表的最底部）添加神话武术对各种mod武器的支持<color_light_red>
注意，你必须启用下面的mods，否则会抛出一个可忽略的错误</color>

<color_light_green>当前支持的mods:Magiclysm，BL9，Cata++，余波未尽，战斗女仆，CBM装备，真·暗黑天际，忍者，萌化计划，永远的后日谈（重制版），夺命武器，朱红</color>
